author: Ashlea Ebeling
title: 10 Chic Granny Flats - In Photos: 10 Chic Granny Flats - Forbes
text: 10 Chic Granny Flats Families are returning to the old days of multi-generational living arrangements, and they’re not just putting granny (or junior) in an extra bedroom. Here’s a peek at 10 cool in-law units from Michael Litchfield’s new book “in-laws, outlaws, and granny flats” published by Taunton Press. On the cover: a charming garden cottage in Lexington, Mass. complements the main house on the property but is distinct enough for its resident to call it her own.
